resources.string: This photo will be added to the gallery so all people will be able to see it (The location where the photo was taken too). Otherwise only you and the person who receives this photo would be able to see it.
A new photo has been received
Tap here to copy User ID to clipboard
End of the list reached.\nClick here to reload
Unknown error has occurred while trying to load photos. \nClick here to retry

User ID is basically your account ID. Every photo you upload is marked with user ID so if you want to be able to access your photos from different phones or restore account after app has been uninstalled you better save this ID.

If photo visibility set to Always Public - all your photos will be available in the gallery for everyone, If it\'s set to Always Private then they won\'t. If it\'s set to Neither - you will be asked what visibility to use every time you take a photo.

It\'s better to set this setting to Can Load Images when you are connected to unmetered network (unlimited download rate). By setting it to Can Access Internet - you won\'t be loading any images when you are not connected to an unmetered network, any other lightweight request will still be possible. Finally by setting it to Neither completely disables any network interactions when you are not connected to an unmetered network.
Current UserId is empty (no photos uploaded yet)
Network Access Level on metered network
Unknown error while trying to restore account: %1$s
